attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new logo was yesterday revealed for the London 2012 Olympics. This logo is not only embarrassing, but it portrays our country in the worst possible way. 

The original London 2012 Logo was better by far. We need a new logo now, or at least a return to the old one!

Having read the general public's comments about this, I will have to add that I think that a childrens competition, possibly one run by a programme such as BBC's Blue Peter, would find a logo that would portray the London Olympics in a much better way, and cost much less than £400,000!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
